pullRequest.body:
---

I have split these out from https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/8583 to aid its review. I believe these changes make sense in their own right.

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6980649102/job/18996304379)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6980649102/job/18996304151)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6980649102/job/18996303330)
I note that the only file (currently) importing this one is `Algebra.Lie.Killing` which already depends on `LinearAlgebra.Eigenspace.Basic` (transitively).

To my shame I have just discovered that this duplicates [LinearMap.baseChange](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/blob/244c4fda94ef8e27711f604be5b3a20ae5786731/Mathlib/RingTheory/TensorProduct.lean#L68).

I will follow up with a PR to remove this definition (and probably expand the comment on `LinearMap.baseChange` to include the words "extension of scalars").

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: various linear algebra results

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: remove triangularizability assumption from proof that Cartan subalgebras are Abelian
